Judia Krakowski

.

I'm Judia Krakowski, a full stack web developer living in North East Pennsylvania.

I enjoy creating websites for creative people, and I've been doing it for more than a decade. I earned a Bachelor's degree in computer science from Full Sail Univeristy, and I'll have a Masters degree in business to top it off. What I do with my knowledge helps people achieve their dreams, and there's no better feeling than that.

I have an extensive background in publishing and entertainment. I've worked tirelessly to improve my skillset to include digital marketing and desktop/digital publishing. I've utilized that skillset to aid my clients in achieving their business goals.

I love what I do, and I like to share that passion with others.
